content: their own chart cut the yarn of color 3 continue knitting in color 2 until you have reached your desired length 36 more rounds in my sample cut the yarn of color 2 tip i like to keep color change line in the middle back of the leg should you wish to do so too arrange stitches accordingly after you have finished the ribbing remember to use a stitch marker to sign the beginning of the row #teaknitting #rosemarysocks 3 heel flap needle 2 32 sts will be the heel flap gusset and sole needle 1 sts will be resting until heel flap and turn is finished color 1 light grey in my sample begin with the rs facing you and knit 1 row turn the work so that ws is facing you slip the first stitch of every row row 1 ws sl1 p31 row 2 rs *sl1 k1 repeat from *to end repeat these 2 row until you have worked a total of 32 row you should end with row 1 you will have a chain selvedge on either side of heel flap heel turn work short row back and forth as follows row 1 rs k19 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2 decrease p1 turn row 3 rs sl1 k to 1 sts before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 p to 1 sts before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat short row 3 & 4 until all sts have been worked ending with k2tog on rs and p2tog on ws 20 sts remain gusset round 1 continue with color 1 and knit 10 sts then change to color 3 mustard in my sample and knit the rest 10 sts of heel turn don´t cut color 1 change of color will be made in the middle of heel sts pick up and knit 16 sts into chain edges of the heel flap knit across needle 1 pick up and knit 16 sts into chain edges of the other side of the heel flap knit 10 heel sts place a marker this is your new beginning of round for the rest of the foot continue by fading colors 1 and 3 the same way you did in the leg light grey and mustard in my sample round 2 begin decreases as follows knit to the last 3 sts of needle 2 k2tog k1 k across instep on needle 1 on needle 2 k1 ssk knit to the end of the round #teaknitting #rosemarysocks 4 continue decreases until you have decreased back to 64 sts i you need more room for the gusset you can make decreases on every other round continue with color 3 mustard in my sample until you are ready for the toe your pinky toe is covered toe on needle 2 knit to the marker middle of the sole cut color 3 and continue with color 1 light grey in my sample or color 2 peachy pink in my sample knit
